items.summary: Add a new UI tab/section within the existing AdminDeleteChatroomsPage chatroom management view that navigates to a "Reset Data" action, without changing any other frontend pages.
In the new "Reset Data" tab/section, implement a "Reset Data" button that prompts for explicit confirmation (e.g., an AlertDialog) and then triggers a site-wide data reset call.

Add a new backend method that wipes all persisted application data (entire site reset), including chatrooms, messages, reactions, active user tracking, user profile data, and resets any ID counters so the canister is effectively returned to a fresh state.

Ensure the new backend reset method contains no caller principal checks and no authorization checks, and the frontend does not add any additional authorization gating beyond the existing admin page password UI.

Wire the admin reset button to the backend reset method using the existing actor/query tooling patterns already used by the app (React Query hooks and actor usage), while keeping changes strictly scoped to the admin delete-chatrooms page on the frontend.
